Name: Hookworm's Highwaymen
Details: Hookworm's Highwaymen were a Pirate band formed by Silas Black and started hitting several merchants on the Canopian-Aurigan Trade Route in 3026 from his base located in Bellerophon. Barrameda's Blackguards under the authority of the Rampart Company hit their primary base, shooting up a bunch of the habitation domes, collapsing their primary Mech Bay and killing most of the 'Highwaymen' and their families.
